name: Resoot
description:
...is a puzzle platformer set in a mine environment.

You take on the role of  little lumps of soot who try to bring some nuggets of gold to their stash.

You will need to redo your actions to reach places you weren't able to reach before.

Controlls:

For this game you only need a keyboard. 

Use 'WASD' to move and navigate menus, 

 'Enter' to press a button, 

 'Space' to jump 

and 'J' to "Redo".

My focus on this one was to put together a somewhat visually polished game with a coherent style.

This game is my submission to the PB Game Jam 5.

For now it only runs on Windows.

Credits:

Thanks to https://www.weloveindies.com/ for the sound assets used in this game!

 All other assets besides the font were made by me.

Social:
